about_the_game:
It is a dark time for the Renegades. The Imperium have expanded their assault to resource rich Prycon, infamous for its harsh icy climate and dangerous indigenous Behemoths called Abominations.

Take the fight to Prycon and challenge new Imperium Adversaries: The Tempest, Ogre, and Shivver, along with a new Behemoth, the Siren, and face Prycon's Abomination, if you dare.

The Imperium Strikes Back includes...
  • New Planet Prycon: Alternate second planet to Norosh, Prycon is far more dangerous and not for the weakhearted. However, Prycon enemies also provide increased DNA rewards. Locked until you've defeated the Imperium at least once.
  • New Prycon Adversary: Tempest - A fearsome Adversary that can control the harsh climate of Prycon to his squads advantage.
  • New Prycon Adversary: Shivver - A cold-hearted assassin that can shutdown even the best of the Renegades
  • New Prycon Adversary: Ogre - An unstoppable force of nature, one of the toughest Adversaries that the Imperium has ever created.
  • New Prycon Behemoth: Abomination - A wild Behemoth, indigenous to Prycon with a voracious appetite and infested with Mites.
  • New Prycon Behemoth: Siren - The Prycon Behemoth that might appear deceptively docile, but has more than a few tricks up her sleeve.
  • New Prycon Drone: Frostbot - A new addition to the Drones. Beware of them in large numbers!

It is a dark time for the Renegades. The Imperium have expanded their assault to resource rich Prycon, infamous for its harsh icy climate and dangerous indigenous Behemoths called Abominations.

Take the fight to Prycon and challenge new Imperium Adversaries: The Tempest, Ogre, and Shivver, along with a new Behemoth, the Siren, and face Prycon's Abomination, if you dare.

The Imperium Strikes Back includes...
  • New Planet Prycon: Alternate second planet to Norosh, Prycon is far more dangerous and not for the weakhearted. However, Prycon enemies also provide increased DNA rewards. Locked until you've defeated the Imperium at least once.
  • New Prycon Adversary: Tempest - A fearsome Adversary that can control the harsh climate of Prycon to his squads advantage.
  • New Prycon Adversary: Shivver - A cold-hearted assassin that can shutdown even the best of the Renegades
  • New Prycon Adversary: Ogre - An unstoppable force of nature, one of the toughest Adversaries that the Imperium has ever created.
  • New Prycon Behemoth: Abomination - A wild Behemoth, indigenous to Prycon with a voracious appetite and infested with Mites.
  • New Prycon Behemoth: Siren - The Prycon Behemoth that might appear deceptively docile, but has more than a few tricks up her sleeve.
  • New Prycon Drone: Frostbot - A new addition to the Drones. Beware of them in large numbers!

name: Star Renegades: The Imperium Strikes Back

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-3220T @ 2.80GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 820 @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750(2GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon™ Pro 460 (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600K @ 3.5GHz / AMD Ryzen™ 3 2200G @ 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960(4GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon™ Pro 570 (4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Journey to Prycon, infamous for its harsh icy climate and dangerous Abominations in this massive free update for Star Renegades.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
